Question
========

Of 6 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 6 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 17 and the standard deviation is 22. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.05
* 1.89
* 2.09
* 3.27

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.05: Incorrect
* 1.89: Correct
* 2.09: Incorrect
* 3.27: Incorrect
